reviewText: Every now and then I click on a movie because I'm desperate for something to watch and I'm tired of re-runs.  "Amazonia" is so bad it is unwatchable.  I may have seen five minutes of it as I scrolled through it to see if at some point the movie improved.  Complete waste of time.  I'm sad Amazon offers it.

this is a rare video review of the classic follow up to cult horror shocker cannibal holocaust that came no 12 in the list of 72 publications prosecutions of the obscene publications act in the 1980;s that warranted an additional 5min 44 secs cuts for scenes of gratified and graphic rape to women and in 2001 and a 15 secs cut in 2011 under the cruelty to animals but the follow up is a lesser sequel more of an movie of vengeance then eating monkeys brains and decapitating guys dicks from Frankie (cool rider ) smales Frankie smales tv and movie review uk
Older style movie.  Like old italian style, think old hercules movies from way back.  Story is just OK but ending kind of weird.
